title: Simulation-Based Online Instructional Design for Improving Grammatical Intonation Proficiency

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical grammar structures and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Constructs a VR-based interactive learning environment considering the applicability of tasks by current practitioners, with project-based assessments to validate practical skills.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the contextual flow of complex math problems and deliver explanations with appropriate intonation at 80% accuracy in a simulated environment
Through VR-based role-play simulation, learners can modify intonation by utilizing auditory feedback at 90% during the process of explaining math concepts
At the end of the 6-month course, learners can demonstrate a 40%+ improvement in intonation application skills through peer evaluation and expert-validated projects
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
